name: Asteroid Arcade (RaMo_teamhellep, Coron, PyjamaLama)
description:
Asteroid Arcade Tell me more!

Asteroid Arcade is an arcade shoot 'em up based on the classic Asteroids where you pilot a spaceship, dodge a lot of asteroids and also shoot 'em.

What am I doing here? Solo Mode
  • Move: Arrow Keys | W A S D
  • Shoot: Ctrl | Space
VS Mode Player 1
  • Move: Arrow Keys
  • Shoot: Ctrl
Player 2
  • Move: W A S D
  • Shoot: Space
Coop Mode Pilot
  • Move: Arrow Keys
Gunner
  • Aim: W A S D
  • Shoot: Space
Credit where credit is due

First of all thank you for playing our first ever made game! And also thanks for reading this far down, we really appreciate it! You are amazing, keep on doing great stuff!

Anyways, who we are:

Raffael Moser aka RaMo_teamhellep - Game Design and Programming

Sarah Wallner aka PyjamaLama - Artwork and Anmations

Philipp Gewald aka Coron - Playtesting and Emotional Support

It is noteworthy that this project was based on the splendid "Your first GameMaker Game" Tutorial Series by the equally splendid Shaun Spalding. His YouTube Channel is definitively worth checking out if you are planning on working with GameMaker Studio.

The sound effects where made using bfxr.net and the background music comes from ProductionCrate.

Bugs, duh

Unfortunately background music doesn't seem to work in the web version. But because this doesn't really affect gameplay we still uploaded it for you to try out! Just remember that everything gets better with a bit of music, so consider downloading the Executable. Thanks!
